message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper proposes a Deep-Reinforcement Learning agent, which is a type of neural network, to optimize routing. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper uses a machine learning approach (Deep-Reinforcement Learning) to optimize routing. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper focuses on optimizing routing in Software Defined Networking (SDN), which falls under the Networking and Internet Architecture category. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes an agent that adapts to current traffic conditions and proposes tailored configurations to minimize network delay, which can be seen as a control problem. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a machine learning approach (Deep-Reinforcement Learning) to optimize routing, which falls under the Artificial Intelligence category.
